```{r visualize_combine_data}
library(tidyverse)
library(gganimate)

combine_data <- read_xlsx("/home/hammera/NFL_Combine_Data/NFL_Combine_Data.xlsx")
occ <- gsub("Â ", "_", colnames(combine_data), fixed=TRUE)
ocb <- gsub(" ", "_", occ)
oca <- gsub("[()]", "", ocb)
nfl_combine <- combine_data
colnames(nfl_combine) <- oca


# color = position, 

position_data <- nfl_combine %>%
#  filter(POS %in% c("RB", "QB", "WR")) %>%
  select(Year, POS, `40_Yard`, Weight_lbs, Bench_Press) %>%
  filter(!(is.na(Weight_lbs)), !is.na(Bench_Press), !is.na(Year), !is.na(`40_Yard`), Year > 1985) %>%
  mutate(year = round(Year)) %>%
  group_by(POS, Year) %>%
  summarize(median_40 = median(`40_Yard`), median_weight = median(Weight_lbs), median_bench = median(Bench_Press)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(the_date = as.Date(ISOdate(Year, 1, 1)))

weight_bench_viz <- ggplot(position_data, aes(x=median_weight, y=median_bench, colour = POS)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size=6, show.legend = TRUE) +
  labs(title = 'Year: {frame_time}', x = 'Median Weight', y = 'Median Bench Press Reps') +
  transition_time(the_date) +
  ease_aes('linear')

```
